indicator.title: Output Indicator
indicator.description: -No. of km of trails additionally mapped with GPS -No. of local businesses cooperating for development for clustered tourism products -GSSCG becomes official member of ITLS International -2 mobile applications developed for project area -No. of sea kayak instructors trained -No. of inbound tour operators and media taking part in organized study visit to the project area

baseline.comment: -100 km of trails mapped with GPS -No local businesses cooperating on development of clustered tourism products -GSSCG in not member of ITLS International -No mobile applications developed for cross border area -No instructors’ base for sea kayak -No organized visit of inbound tour operators and media in the project area

target.comment: -At least 50 km of trails additionally mapped with GPS in Montenegro -2 outdoor tourism clusters established, one in Montenegro and one in Croatia -Geoportal fully functional with regular data updating -2 mobile applications developed for project area -At least 8 members of GSSCG certified for white waters rescuing -2 visits of the local tourism agencies to the outbound markets -At least 5 inbound tour operators and media representatives taking part in organized study visit to the project area

actual.comment: 50 km of hiking trails scanned with GPS 2 outdoor tourism clusters established in Montenegro and in Croatia 2 mobile applications for destination promotion developed and active as of September. Download from google play/apple store: “Adriatic Adventure” 55 signs and info table posted along Adriatic Transversal 8 mentor’s lead ideas for outdoor tourism clusters developed 8 new joint tourism products for outdoor tourism between Montenegro and Croatia developed and in sale 10 agencies from both countries had destination presentation and more then 40 B2B meetings with lead French tour operators 4 tour operators from France took part in the study visit to the destination 3 selling agreements with tour operators from France concluded with local agencies/clusters, as from 2015.

target.comment: -At least 3000 hints on geoportal www.adriaticadventure.eu -At least 2000 downloads of 2 mobile applications "Adriatic Adventure" (android and iOS platforms) -2 outdoor tourism clusters formalized their cooperation through joint statement -Visit of outdoor clusters' to outbound market -Second study visit to the project area by outbound operators organized -Project evaluation completed -Project Final Report submitted to the donor

actual.comment: -App. 4500 hints on geoportal www.adriaticadventure.eu until project closure -App. 2500 downloads of 2 mobile applications "Adriatic Adventure" until project closure -2 outdoor tourism clusters signed Memorandum of Understanding for future cooperation -9 agencies from both countries had destination presentation and more then 25 B2B meetings with lead Swedish tour operators -Second study visit for Swedish tour operators organized -Project evaluation report prepared and endorsed by UNDP and donor -Project Final Report approved by donor

indicator.title: Output Indicator
indicator.description: 1. Number of IDUs reached by HIV prevention services 2. Number of IDUs on opoid substitution therapy 3. Number of MSM reached by HIV prevention services 4. Number of FSWs reached by HIV prevention services 5. Number of merchant marines reached by HIV prevention services 6. Number of Roma youth reached by HIV prevention services 7. Number of prisoners reached by HIV education/counselling services 8. Number of condoms distributed 9. Number of students covered with HLS subject (in primary and secondary schools) 10. Number of PLHIV that received psychosocial support 11. Number of health staff trained in different aspects of HIV response 12. Number of non-health staff (peer educators, teachers, journalists, police officers, judges and other GO and NGO staff) trained in different aspects of HIV response -

location.name: Cetinje
location.description: seat of a first-order administrative division
location.activity-description: The project is dealing with economic revitalization of the old royal capital Cetinje trough urban reconstruction of the cultural heritage with energy efficiency considerations, provision of vocational trainings, support to small businesses and encouraging green design ideas and innovations.

indicator.title: Output Indicator
indicator.description: 1. Number of unemployed trained for retrofits/reconstruction of objects of cultural heritage and public spaces and green businesses 2. Number of unemployed hired for retrofits/reconstruction of objects of cultural heritage and public spaces and green businesses 3. Decrease of energy consumption /CO2 emissions decrease 4. Number of cultural heritage objects and public spaces retrofitted/reconstructed

baseline.comment: 1. 0 unemployed in Cetinje trained for retrofit of objects of cultural heritage 2. 0 unemployed in Cetinje hired for retrofits/reconstruction of objects of cultural heritage and public spaces and green businesses 3. Average energy consumption in objects of cultural heritage (200 Kwh per m2) and GHG emissions (CO2 emissions 70 t/kWh) 4. 0 objects of cultural heritage and public spaces retrofitted/reconstructed

target.comment: 1. At least 10 unemployed trained for retrofit 2. At least 10 unemployed hired for retrofits/reconstruction 3. Co2 emission decreased 4. Energy consumption decreased by at least 30% in retrofitted building 5. At least 1 cultural heritage object retrofitted/reconstructed & at least one public space reconstructed

actual.comment: 1. 0 2. 5 3. 40 t of CO2 4. Energy consumption decreased by 50% 5. 1/0

target.comment: 1. At least 10 unemployed trained for retrofit 2. At least 10 unemployed hired for retrofits/reconstruction 3. CO2 emission decreased 4. Energy consumption decreased by at least 30% in retrofitted building 5. At least 1 cultural heritage object retrofitted/reconstructed & at least one public space reconstructed
